meta.description: Optimize the production of mochas and regular coffees to minimize total production time.

params.name: coffee_powder_requirement
params.description: Units of coffee powder required per product.

params.name: milk_requirement
params.description: Units of milk required per product.

params.name: production_time
params.description: Time in minutes required to produce each product.

params.name: available_coffee_powder
params.description: Total available units of coffee powder.

vars.name: production_quantity
vars.description: Number of each product to produce.

objective.name: min_total_production_time
objective.description: Minimize the total production time for all products.

constraints.name: coffee_powder_constraint
constraints.description: Total coffee powder used must not exceed available supply.

constraints.name: milk_constraint
constraints.description: Total milk used must not exceed available supply.

constraints.name: popularity_constraint
constraints.description: The number of mochas produced must be at least three times the number of regular coffees.
